job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <ul><li><strong>Bachelors degree and higher</strong></li><li><strong>Core DS &amp; ML Model skill set</strong></li><li><strong>AWS Cloud Preferred</strong></li><li><strong>Python Programming along with Flask (or similar to Flask modules)</strong></li><li><strong>Be able to share &amp; showcase gitHub code if they have any</strong></li><li><strong>Be able&nbsp;to create and deploy models and create webApps or something else where business users will know how to use these models for their business purpose</strong></li><li><strong>Shiny with R capabilities (Optional)</strong></li><li><strong>Supply Chain management experience (Optional, but good to have)</strong></li><li><strong>CI/CD,gitHub/BitBucket,Jenkins</strong></li><li><strong>SQL skillet</strong></li></ul><p><strong>Experience should be : 5+</strong></p>
